attributes.action: The UK should allow refugees from Ukraine to come to the country immediately
attributes.additional_details: These are exceptional times for our near neighbours in Europe.  We should be considering all options to support these people in these desperate circumstances
attributes.background: During the exceptional circumstances unfolding.  The UK should bypass the strict immigration requirements for those fleeing the conflict in the Ukraine

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
